PDFxTMDLib  0.1.0
GSLInterp2D.h
1 #pragma once
2 #include <gsl/gsl_interp2d.h>
3 
4 #include <iostream>
5 #include <memory>
6 #include <stdexcept>
7 #include <vector>
8 
9 class GSLInterp2D
10 {
11  public:
12  enum InterpolationType
13  {
14  Bilinear,
15  Bicubic
16  };
17 
18  // Delete copy constructor and copy assignment operator
19  GSLInterp2D(const GSLInterp2D &) = delete;
20  GSLInterp2D &operator=(const GSLInterp2D &) = delete;
21  // Constructor: Initializes the 2D interpolator with grid
22  // and data.
23  GSLInterp2D(const std::vector<double> &x, const std::vector<double> &y,
24  const std::vector<double> &z, InterpolationType interpType)
25  : x_size(x.size()), y_size(y.size()), x_vals(x), y_vals(y), z_vals(z)
26  {
27  if (x.size() * y.size() != z.size())
28  {
29  std::cout << x.size() << "---" << y.size() << "----" << z.size() << std::endl;
30  throw std::invalid_argument("Mismatch in grid and data sizes");
31  }
32 
33  // Allocate GSL objects with custom deleters
34  accel_x.reset(gsl_interp_accel_alloc());
35  accel_y.reset(gsl_interp_accel_alloc());
36  switch (interpType)
37  {
38  case InterpolationType::Bilinear:
39  interp.reset(gsl_interp2d_alloc(gsl_interp2d_bilinear, x_size, y_size));
40  break;
41  case InterpolationType::Bicubic:
42  interp.reset(gsl_interp2d_alloc(gsl_interp2d_bicubic, x_size, y_size));
43  break;
44  default:
45  std::runtime_error("[GSLInterp2D] undefined interpolation type for "
46  "gsl is selected!");
47  break;
48  }
49 
50  // Initialize the interpolator with grid and data points
51  gsl_interp2d_init(interp.get(), x_vals.data(), y_vals.data(), z.data(), x_size, y_size);
52  }
53 
54  // Function to interpolate the value at (x, y)
55  double interpolate(double x, double y) const
56  {
57  return gsl_interp2d_eval(interp.get(), x_vals.data(), y_vals.data(), z_vals.data(), x, y,
58  accel_x.get(), accel_y.get());
59  }
60 
61  // Move constructor
62  GSLInterp2D(GSLInterp2D &&other) noexcept
63  : x_size(other.x_size), y_size(other.y_size), x_vals(std::move(other.x_vals)),
64  y_vals(std::move(other.y_vals)), z_vals(std::move(other.z_vals)),
65  accel_x(std::move(other.accel_x)), accel_y(std::move(other.accel_y)),
66  interp(std::move(other.interp))
67  {
68  // Reset other object to a valid state
69  other.x_size = 0;
70  other.y_size = 0;
71  }
72 
73  // Move assignment operator
74  GSLInterp2D &operator=(GSLInterp2D &&other) noexcept
75  {
76  if (this != &other)
77  {
78  x_size = other.x_size;
79  y_size = other.y_size;
80  x_vals = std::move(other.x_vals);
81  y_vals = std::move(other.y_vals);
82  z_vals = std::move(other.z_vals);
83  accel_x = std::move(other.accel_x);
84  accel_y = std::move(other.accel_y);
85  interp = std::move(other.interp);
86 
87  // Reset other object to a valid state
88  other.x_size = 0;
89  other.y_size = 0;
90  }
91  return *this;
92  }
93 
94  private:
95  size_t x_size, y_size;
96  std::vector<double> x_vals;
97  std::vector<double> y_vals;
98  mutable std::vector<double> z_vals;
99 
100  // Declare unique pointers with custom deleters for GSL
101  // objects
102  std::unique_ptr<gsl_interp_accel, decltype(&gsl_interp_accel_free)> accel_x{
103  nullptr, gsl_interp_accel_free};
104  std::unique_ptr<gsl_interp_accel, decltype(&gsl_interp_accel_free)> accel_y{
105  nullptr, gsl_interp_accel_free};
106  std::unique_ptr<gsl_interp2d, decltype(&gsl_interp2d_free)> interp{nullptr, gsl_interp2d_free};
107 };
GSLInterp2D
